name: Trip (itch) (Trip Time Games)
description:
WARNING: This amusement may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

Where will you go on a Trip?

Trip is an amusement which you can experience of an animated optical illusion. 

Put on your favorite tunes in the background or just experience this trip in silence.  

What you experience on a trip is for you, just maybe you will discover something about yourself along the way.
